description:
This is a quick trail run, up and down again in 60 minutes. The pace and difficulty is moderate/intermediate. The trails are a combination of gravel or dirt and have natural obstacles like rocks and roots, some stepper grades (20%)
Distance: +/- 4-5 km
Time needed: 60 minutes - perhaps longer or shorter depending on pace and number of rest breaks
Difficulty: Moderate
The Run:
From the trailhead (see location information below for how to get there) run up Nicole's, across Mels, and then back down Dead Moped and the North Road trails to Jim's Jungle and back to the beginning.
directions:
Location:
If you're going east on Gaglardi Way it's a short distance (roughly .5k) before you get to the intersection with Broadway/Como Lake Road. Coming the other way, it's just as you finish turning the big corner to go up the mountain. There is parking along the shoulder of the road (north side). 
Parking Lot: South side of park, trail head & info board at the intersection of Nicole's Trail & Pipeline Trail.
title: Burnaby Mountain: Nicoles, Mel's, Dead Moped, Jim's Jungle
